Package src.graph

Class Node<T,R>

java.lang.Object
src.graph.Node<T,R>
Direct Known Subclasses:
NodeDecorator
public class Node<T,R> extends Object
Clase que representa un nodo en un grafo.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Juan Larrondo y Abril Palanco
